Data

Package data, including a sample of the ICEWS event data.

CAMEO code dictionary

Cleaning up

Destructive functions to remove all or portions of the data and database.

burn_it_down()

Remove all data

purge_db() remove_db()

Purge or delete ICEWS database

purge_data_files()

Purge file downloads
